about_the_game:
Sci-fi Themed Map Pack


Ray-guns, space ships, weird planets or post-apocalyptic canyons. If these are part of your adventures, the Sci-fi map pack can help to visualize the action. The maps have a retro look and could work in pulp sci-fi games as well. This pack contains 25 battle maps and includes the following:

  • 7 Ship interior maps
  • Two person-fighter
  • 4 Space station maps
  • Lava field
  • Canyon
  • Forest
  • Beach
  • 3 Tunnel maps
  • Smelter
  • Scrap yard
  • Landing pad
  • Moon surface
  • Shanty town
  • Compound

The module contains maps optimized for online use in Fantasy Grounds.

Requirements: A license for Fantasy Grounds (Standard or Ultimate) or an active license subscription.
